description:
Extent of employment

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
13111 Employees subject to social insurance contributions

Definition:
The extent of employment of employees subject to social
insurance contributions is based on the data reported by the
employers in the relevant documents. Depending on the ratio
of the weekly working hours agreed in the employment
contract to the general working hours of the establishment,
a distinction is made between full-time and part-time
employment in each employment case. Those cases in which the
data of the employers on the weekly working hours are
invalid or missing are labelled as "No data provided" cases.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Extent of employment
